attributes.action: provide full timer carers the right to recieve at least the minimum wage per hour for caring for their relatives such as their mum etc..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Think in silence here:


You work in a supermarket and life is great when you know you have a reasonable income are getting around £600 a month.


Now think about this : 


A daughter is caring for her mum full time - only living on income support and carers allowance - which is around £320 a month.


Which do you think is not fair?


These full time carers looking after relatives or so are not getting the fair money - why aren't they entitled to saving up for a holiday as to release the occasional stress as to carers recieve, why aren't they entitled to decent food? why aren't they entitled to drive around to take their relatives about. 

Why aren't they getting the pay they deserve? What if it was you who had to end up stop working on full time work and had to care for your mum?? How would you feel if you had £600 down to £320?


Please help sign this petition to get this point of unfair pay towards full time carers as it would help not just my friend but for others too.
